did.unittitle: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America Local 142 Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America. Local 142 (Pittsburgh, Pa.)

did.abstract: Robert Argentine was a construction worker and member of Local 142 of the United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America in Pittsburgh, Pa., and served at the top level of the Carpenters District Council of Western Pennsylvania. This collection contains meeting minutes and financial documents of Local 142 and the Carpenters' District Council of Western Pennsylvania, as well as other papers accumulated by Argentine.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Folders 1 and 45 in Box 4 are restricted for 75 years from date of creation. A signed confidentiality agreement must be signed to view the contents of these folders until the restriction is lifted. Please contact the Archives Service Center for more information.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Robert Argentine began in 1942 as a construction worker and member of Local 142 of the United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America, which was chartered in February 1886, and represents carpenters in Pittsburgh, Pa. He later became a business agent within Pittsburgh's sub-district of the carpenters union before being elected secretary-treasurer of the Carpenters' District Council of Western Pennsylvania, the council's highest post. He also served as vice-president of the Allegheny County Labor Council, AFL-CIO. Argentine also served in several civic leadership positions, including the board of directors for the Port Authority of Allegheny County and the state planning commission under Governor Robert Casey. He died March 10, 2006.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Zachary Brodt in March 2010.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This collection contains meeting minutes and financial documents of Local 142 and the Carpenters' District Council of Western Pennsylvania which were accumulated by Robert Argentine. Also present are contracts and by-laws from various carpenter and trade local unions and district councils. Information about the Carpenters' benefits plans and investments are also included.
